entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Atikokan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:54 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Atikokan 5:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Temperature: -16.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 56 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -23.0°C
Wind: WSW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
